001package reciprocal.number.complex;
002
003import static java.util.Objects.hash;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.io.Serial;
007import java.io.Serializable;
008import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
009import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
010
011/**
012 * Base class for polar forms
013 *
014 * @param <N> number
015 * @param <T> this
016 * @since 0.0.1
017 */
018public abstract class AbstractPolarForm<N extends Number, T extends AbstractPolarForm<N, T>> implements Serializable {
019    @Serial
020    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
021
022    private final @NotNull N radial;
023    private final @NotNull N angular;
024
025    /**
026     * Constructor
027     *
028     * @param radial radial
029     * @param angular angular
030     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code radial == null}
031     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code angular == null}
032     * @since 0.0.1
033     */
034    protected AbstractPolarForm(final @NotNull N radial, final @NotNull N angular) {
035        this.radial = requireNonNull(radial, "radial");
036        this.angular = requireNonNull(angular, "angular");
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * Radial
041     *
042     * @return radial
043     * @since 0.0.1
044     */
045    public final @NotNull N getRadial() {
046        return radial;
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Angular
051     *
052     * @return angular
053     * @since 0.0.1
054     */
055    public final @NotNull N getAngular() {
056        return angular;
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * Returns if this is equal by comparing to other
061     *
062     * @param other other
063     * @return {@link Boolean}
064     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code other == null}
065     * @since 0.0.1
066     */
067    public abstract boolean equalsByComparing(@NotNull T other);
068
069    /**
070     * Returns if this is not equal by comparing to other
071     *
072     * @param other other
073     * @return {@link Boolean}
074     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code other == null}
075     * @since 0.0.1
076     */
077    public final boolean doesNotEqualByComparing(final @NotNull T other) {
078        return !equalsByComparing(other);
079    }
080
081    @Override
082    public final int hashCode() {
083        return hash(radial, angular);
084    }
085
086    @Override
087    public final boolean equals(final @Nullable Object obj) {
088        if (this == obj) {
089            return true;
090        }
091        if (obj == null || getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
092            return false;
093        }
094        final var other = (AbstractPolarForm<?, ?>) obj;
095        return radial.equals(other.getRadial()) && angular.equals(other.getAngular());
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public final @NotNull String toString() {
100        return getClass().getSimpleName() + "{radial=" + radial + ", angular=" + angular + "}";
101    }
102}
